contributing.title: Contributing
contributing.description: We're thrilled that you're interested in contributing to TextIgniterJS! This document outlines the process for contributing to our project. Whether you're fixing bugs, improving documentation, or proposing new features, your contributions are welcome.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: TextIgniterJS a lightweight and efficient rich text editor built entirely with pure TypeScript. Designed to prioritize minimal bundle size, this editor eliminates dependency on external third-party libraries, making it an ideal choice for modern web applications where performance and simplicity are key.

javascript.title: Javascript
javascript.description: - Initialization: Follow these steps to initialize and configure TextIgniterJS in your project.

our-contributors.title: Our Contributors
our-contributors.description: We want to extend our heartfelt gratitude to the contributors who have made @mindfiredigital/TextIgniterJS possible.
